content: this pattern is for a cute crochet snail with a shell made from a heart it is perfect for valentine s day this crochet snail is easy to make and you can use it for any embellishment scrapbooking or card making finished size snail is about 2-1/4 7 cm long free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-snail/ video tutorial https //youtu be/afepeisyasm by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format the pattern also includes instructions for the heart balloon heart bow and a small heart
